Body:
I am in the process of deploying a Windows Universal App to my Raspberry Pi 2. I am following a very handy guide published here.

Everything's fine but I get a peculiar warning when trying to run the iotstartup command after having established the PsSession.

If I simply press return again
column9:
the message disappears and the command seems to work fine...

Am I doing something wrong here? Is it a known powershell thing
column10: or has something gone awry on my device?   (If it's of any significance
column11:
I had to re-flash the OS once or twice in order to get anything to deploy remotely).

I hope it's not my device; but I would be interested to hear of any clarification on this sort of issue.

"

Body:
iotstartup as setcomputername are executables. Use the invoke command, see this article.

& iotstartup list

will do.

"
Thanks. This is what I get when I try to pick up about five unfamiliar technologies at once!
